Body:
"""Test non existent user raises exception."""
msg = (
    'An error occurred (NoSuchEntity) when calling the %s operation: The user with name John cannot be found.'
     % method)
with pytest.raises(MockBoto3ClientError) as e:
    getattr(self.client, inflection(method))(UserName=self.user)
assert msg == str(e.value)
mock_iampytest.mark.parametrize('method', ['AddUserToGroup', 'CreateAccessKey',
    'DeleteUser', 'GetUser', 'ListAccessKeys', 'ListAttachedUserPolicies',
    'ListGroupsForUser', 'ListMFADevices', 'ListSigningCertificates',
    'RemoveUserFromGroup'])
